content: for the last couple of years i ve made dishcloths to donate to my local food pantry and i try to drop off my donation in the weeks leading up to thanksgiving i donate through the each stitch counts project and each dishcloth is donated with a bottle of dish soap this year i ve been using these patterns centered on half_double_crochet each dishcloth calls for worsted weight cotton and a size h hook all the examples in the picture below were made in lily s peaches n cream they are fast and easy and each finished dishcloth is about eight inches across enjoy
